name: Ask Questions If Underspecified
description: Clarify ambiguous requirements by asking questions before implementing. Only when invoked explicitly.
longDescription: Plugin with a single `ask-questions-if-underspecified` skill that activates when requests are ambiguous — unclear objectives, scope, constraints, or acceptance criteria. Asks 1–5 scannable, multiple-choice questions with recommended defaults before any code changes. Supports a fast-path `defaults` reply to accept all recommendations. Includes question templates for scope, compatibility targets, and done criteria, plus anti-patterns to avoid over-questioning.
